title: Madonna - Hard Candy (2008)
description:
MADONNA - HARD CANDY, album released between April 24th and 29th 2008 worldwide.
Encoded 320Kbps [Lame] mp3. Covers included.

Madonna?s eleventh, and final, studio album for Warner Bros., &#039;Hard Candy&#039; is a brilliant up-tempo collection that adds a hip-hop beat to the cultural icon?s club sensibilities, thanks to collaborations with Timbaland, Justin Timberlake, Pharrell Williams, and Nate "Danja" Hills. Following her previous studio album, 2005?s &#039;Confessions On A Dance Floor&#039;, which debuted No.1 and has sold more than 8 million copies around the globe, &#039;Hard Candy&#039; punctuates the first 25 years of the album career of the most successful female artist in history with a musical exclamation point. The lead single of the album is &#039;4 Minutes&#039; featuring Justin Timberlake. &#039;4 Minutes&#039; has already topped the charts in Canada, Denmark, Finland, and Norway and reached the top 5 in the United Kingdom, United States, Israel, Australia and Poland. It has so far peaked at No.1 in fifteen countries and in the top 10 in others. It is currently number one on the United World Chart.

Tracks:  
01  Candy Shop
02  4 Minutes [Feat.Justin Timberlake and Timbaland]
03  Give It 2 Me
04  Heartbeat
05  Miles Away
06  She&#039;s Not Me
07  Incredible
08  Beat Goes On [Feat.Kanye West]
09  Dance Tonight
10  Spanish Lesson
11  Devil Wouldn&#039;t Recognise You
12  Voices
